name: Barbacteria's Odyssey
description:
Take control of Captain Barbacteria, the greatest pirate that has been in the blood flow, but no one begins with that fame. Help him in his odyssey and turn him into a legend. Use your Minions to take down the immune system and infect everything in your path.

Barbacteria's Odyssey is a Top Down Twin Stick Shooter, it take place inside the human body with a pirate theme. Where the bacterias are the pirates in search for glory and the treasures hidden in the human body, they also search for the "Ultmate Treasures" that lies in the deepest zone of the body. While the antibodies and the inmmune system are the navy, trying to protect the body from every threat.

Note: The boss fight is still on development, so if any bug appears please contact us to improve the game

Upcoming Features:

  • Multiplayer (Co-op and Versus)
  • More levels
  • Different Minions
  • and more...
